Row.Text: You win this victory when first to build 15 Sanctuaries.

The people of the New World have preserved its pristine beauty and natural perfection.[NEWLINE]Will you also honour that tradition or plunder the New World for its resources?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The player who completes 15 Sanctuaries before time expires (175 turns) will triumph over its rivals.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]SPECIAL RULES:[NEWLINE]Domination, Culture, Religious and Science victories are disabled.
